sentences.en: And new 19 - inch units offer such tantalizing features as sharper and more colorful displays.
sentences.cn: 新式19寸(电视机)的图像更清晰,色彩更逼真,给人以身临其境的感觉.

sentences.en: And that set the stage for what turned outthe tantalizing collision in the Finals.
sentences.cn: 这就为总决赛诱人的碰撞布置好了舞台.

sentences.en: Even more tantalizing, omega - 3 s interact with the fatty layers that surround brain cells.
sentences.cn: 更具吸引力的是, Ω - 3脂肪酸能够和脑细胞周围的脂肪层起反应.

sentences.en: His tantalizing charisma has wooed many gorgeous women and deceived many deadly adversaries.
sentences.cn: 他的男人魅力已经吸引了很多美丽的女性,蒙蔽了许多致命的对手.

sentences.en: It was tantalizing never to be exposed long enough to hear the end.
sentences.cn: 接触流言不能长久,每每听不上结尾,实在叫人心痒难熬.

sentences.en: Nature supplies some hints, not of the transcendental order but altogether more tantalizing and momentary.
sentences.cn: 自然提供了一些暗示, 不属于超验论,但是要迷人得多,短促得多.

sentences.en: She met his eagerness with that smiling, tantalizing passivity.
sentences.cn: 她以笑盈盈的 、 半推半就的姿态对付他那热切的情意.

sentences.en: Sometimes in his room above he could hear her moving about, a tantalizing, faint, lovely noise.
sentences.cn: 有时候他在上边自己房间里能听到她在房间里走动, 那是微弱可爱 、 撩人心怀的响动.

sentences.en: the tantalizing smell of fried bacon
sentences.cn: 诱人的煎熏猪肉的味道

sentences.en: The younger woman could almost smell the tantalizing aroma of purple lilacs.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻妇女几乎嗅到了紫丁香诱人的芬芳.

sentences.en: We have only vague and tantalizing glimpses of his power.
sentences.cn: 我们只能隐隐约约地领略他的威力,的确有一种可望不可及的感觉.

words.tran_cn: 撩人的；逗引性的；干着急的

trans.tran_cn: 逗人的，惹弄人的，撩人的，煽情的
trans.tran_en: making you feel a desire to have or do something

trans.tran_cn: 逗弄，引诱，折磨( tantalize的现在分词 )
